Uses of Class
de.uzk.hki.da.cb.AbstractAction

  • Packages that use AbstractAction 
    Package Description
    de.uzk.hki.da.cb
    Action classes implementing the basic workflow steps of the DNS.
    de.uzk.hki.da.core
    Core functions of the ContentBroker.

    • Uses of AbstractAction in de.uzk.hki.da.cb

      Subclasses of AbstractAction in de.uzk.hki.da.cb 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ArchiveReplicationAction
      Does the decoupled and time based Archive Replication to the given minimum number of required nodes.
      class  ArchiveReplicationCheckAction
      Checks if the minimum number of replications of an AIP, as specified by minNodes, is available on any set of available resources as specified in the local node's repl_destinations.
      class  AuditAction
      Audit Action.
      class  BuildAIPAction
      Copies derivates for presentation out of the package Deletes unnecessary representations which in case of deltas have been added.
      class  CheckFormatsAction 
      class  CleanWorkAreaAction 
      class  ConvertAction
      Executes local ConversionInstructions and waits for ConversionInstructions which were to be done on other Nodes.
      class  CreateEDMAction 
      class  CreatePremisAction 
      class  DeleteObjectAction
      For a given object deletes the object folder from the UserArea deletes any existing packages belonging to the Object from the IngestArea
      class  FetchPIPsAction
      Fetches the PIPs from the nodes on which they've originally been created.
      class  FriendshipConversionAction
      FriendshipConversionAction takes a job that has been created by ScanAction on another node, replicates the xIP to its local node, executes all of the jobs ConversionInstructions and replicates all newly created files back to the node where the ScanAction has run.
      class  IndexESAction 
      class  ObjectToWorkAreaAction 
      class  PostRetrievalAction 
      class  PrepareSendToPresenterAction
      First moves the dip out of the package to another location.
      class  RegisterURNAction
      Checks if the premis file or mets file delivered with the SIP contains URN information.
      class  RestartIngestWorkflowAction
      Resets the job from any status between 12x and 36x to status 120.
      class  RetrievalAction
      Retrieves Packages from the DataGrid.
      class  ScanAction
      Scans the files and builds ConversionInstructions for them if MIGRATION right is granted.
      class  ScanForPresentationAction 
      class  SendToPresenterAction
      TODO refactor in a way that a single FOXML-File is created and ingested based on the conversion events (and package type).
      class  ShortenFileNamesAction 
      class  TarAction
      Build the AIP (in tar format and surrounded by bagit container) from the (partial) object under /da-nrw/fork/(contractor-short-name)/(object-identifier).
      class  UnpackAction
      Does the following steps during the (early) ingest stage of a package: Looks in the homedir of the delivering user if it can find a file [orig_name].[containersuffix] there.
      class  UpdateMetadataAction
      Performs updates to metadata file that are necessary to keep the metadata, especially the paths to referenced files, in sync with the actual package content after conversion actions took place.

    • Uses of AbstractAction in de.uzk.hki.da.core

      Methods in de.uzk.hki.da.core that return AbstractAction 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AbstractAction ActionFactory.buildNextAction()
      Following the defined priorities (context) of job types this method tests for every job type if there are jobs for this type found in the database which have to be done.
